name: Sakai Clan Armor
description: Armor worn by the leaders of the Sakai clan. Imposing and sturdy, it strikes fear into the hearts of enemies.

name: Ghost Armor
description: Armor inspired by the legend of the Ghost. Designed for stealth and terrifying the enemy.

name: Gosaku's Armor
description: Legendary armor said to be worn by the guardian of Tsushima's farmers. Offers unparalleled protection.

name: Ronin Attire
description: Simple clothing worn by wandering samurai. Offers freedom of movement but little protection.

name: Traveler's Attire
perk: Tracks artifacts and clears fog of war.
description: Perfect for exploring the vast landscapes of Tsushima. It helps the wearer find hidden secrets.

name: Samurai Clan Armor
description: Standard issue armor for the samurai of Tsushima. Reliable and tough.

name: Tadayori's Armor
description: Armor once worn by the legendary archer Tadayori. Enhances the skills of any bowman.

name: Kensei Armor
description: Worn by the Straw Hat dualists. It rewards aggressive and precise combat.

name: Sarugami Armor
perk: Disables standard parry, rewards perfect parry.
description: A risky armor set for those who have mastered the blade. High risk, high reward.

name: Fundoshi
perk: Running and sprinting make no noise.
description: Traditional undergarment. Favored by those who have had too much sake or simply no fear.

name: Mongol Commander's Armor
description: Armor taken from a Mongol leader. Allows Jin to walk amongst enemies unnoticed for a time.
